title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.114 - Wiping cloths
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.114 - Wiping cloths

State Regulations
(a) Moist cloths used for wiping food-contact surfaces of equipment are to be used only for this purpose. These cloths are to be stored in a sanitizing solution between uses. (b) Moist cloths used for cleaning nonfood-contact surfaces of equipment are to be stored in a sanitizing solution between uses, and are to be used only for this purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.114

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
